title: Linocut Typographic Maps
content:
Hello i am in my final yea of University.. and studying graphic design...  
i hope to continue with this city map series when i finish......i hope i can post this here...

here are some of the images...of maps i have done so far..

New york (my first linocut)  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258516606/in/set-72157603...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424140025/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258516606/in/set-72157603892334695/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258516606/in/set-72157603892334695/")

London (commisioned by ISTD for my city my London)  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258521132/in/set-72157603...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424140025/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258521132/in/set-72157603892334695/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258521132/in/set-72157603892334695/")

Amsterdam (for a college project in which i could do what i wanted, so i really wanted to carry on with the series so had just been to amsterdam and loved the look of the map.. so carved it)  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258526982/in/set-72157603...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424140025/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258526982/in/set-72157603892334695/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/markandrewwebber/2258526982/in/set-72157603892334695/")

yea i have more pictures but you can scroll through the sets for them!...

im going to be doing Paris this summer.

kk cheers!.
author: dexter121uk

comments.content:
This is excellent work. I'm quite quite sure you're familiar, and I mean no disrespect by repeating something you may have heard before, but you'd probably like the artwork for Radiohead's <cite>Hail to the Thief</cite>...

Good luck with Paris. I'm looking forward to seeing it!
That is amazing work. I love it. Will you be printing them, and show the printed versions as well? :)

Ohh i dont think i have linked to the images on here before. i Checked out my forum post history on the tracker and it said that i posted a link to an ebay Auction in about 2006 when i was selling a print on there (learnt ebay isnt the best place to sell artwork) but i had not done either London or Amsterdam by then i dont think. but if i have mentioned it somewhere before! AHH.. this is just an update then!\>

cheers... well there are prints on my Flickr site! CHEERS!

TYPOGRAPHY !!!!!!!!!!!  
Mark Webber ISTD  
 [www.markandrewwebber.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424140025/http:/www.markandrewwebber.com/ "www.markandrewwebber.com")
